item.title: Light Weight Jumper
item.description: 💞💞💞 for this gorgeous jumper! Eco friendly. Soft. Super light weight. And though I think my little 🐝 looks adorable in anything she wears, her cuteness level hits an all time high in this adorable piece. Contact me to order a little jumper for your kiddo! Sizes 0-24m, made to your little 🐝’s size and colour preferences.

item.title: Toddler Pouch
item.description: On vacation mode tomorrow and the little 🐝is always wanting to carry our bags, so whipped up this little pouch so she doesn’t feel left out. So much fun watching her carry it around, putting little trinkets inside. Within minutes she already had the drawstring figured out lol. Contact me if you want one for your little one too! Lots of colors available. $15.00, shipping included in 🇨🇦🇺🇸.

item.title: Plum Romper
item.description: So in love with this plum romper. With an off-centre button to add a little bit of Whimzy and some wonderful ruffles for a little bit of fun! Can’t wait to see it on the little 🐝 Comes in lots colors, email to order yours today!

item.title: Boho Fringe Vest
item.description: A little boho fringe for any season ☀️👷🏽🍁❄️ Contact me to order yours today! Loads of colors to choose from. $35.00, shipping included in 🇨🇦 🇺🇸

item.title: Tranquil Traveler Rompers
item.description: Tranquility. Peace. Joy. An appreciation of boredom. An ability to embrace quietness and find beauty in the stillness. These are things I want for my little 🐝. Some days though, ooooh I have work to do in the role modelling of those qualities. So, for the day when words failed me and I got a little frustrated (albeit she poured sunscreen all over the house and then ten minutes after everything was all cleaned up she peeled off her diaper and pooped on the floor), I decided to create my hopes for her.

item.title: Suspender Shorts
item.description: So happy with these wonderful textured suspenders shorts! Hope the little man loves them as much as we do!

item.title: Sheep Hat
item.description: My daughter’s favourite song is “I just want to be a sheep (she cues in quite loudly on the Baa Baa 😂). So of course I had to make her a sheep hat of her very own!DM me to order your own hat today 💞

item.title: Pink Hat
item.description: One of our favourite hats! My little 🐝 looks ADORABLE in it! She melts hearts wherever we go 💞 even though it’s only summer, who can resist this girl power hat! Can be made in any colour combination 😀 DM to order your hat today!

item.title: Flower Halter
item.description: So in love with this new halter! Wishing I could keep it for my own little 🐝💞! But for now, it’s fair thee well and safe travels! Can’t wait to make a twin for it soon 😄

item.title: Little Monkey Hat
item.description: Who doesn’t want this for their little 🐵! Custom order your little bee their own today! $30.00, shipping included in Canada!

item.title: Emerald Ease Romper
item.description: Emerald Ease ☀️ the perfect romper for sunshine adventures. Relaxed fit for busy bee’s and easy to put on and take off for tired mamas!

item.title: Cozy Knit Hat
item.description: Brrrr it’s cold today! Reminded me of this whimsical cozy hat I knit for my wee 🐝! DM me if you are interested in a soft snuggly hat for your kiddo (and one to match for you!)

item.title: Custom Shorts
item.description: Loving these custom made shorts for an adorable little! Can’t wait to see them on him!

item.title: Gender Neutral Sunhat
item.description: Whipped up an adorable gender neutral sunhat for my little 🐝 (the stinker keeps losing all of her hats lol!) love how this cotton yarn keeps the sun out but looks and feels so light and fun!

item.title: Princess Skirt
item.description: When it’s your birthday and you want to be a princess 👸🏼

item.title: Whimsical Skirt
item.description: Loving this whimsical skirt! Sea blue and super soft! DM to order, sizes 0-24m.

item.title: Breezy Cotton Skirt
item.description: ❤️❤❤ this breezy 100% cotton skirt! Sizes 0-3T available! Order your little 🐝s today!

item.description: Swing into summer with this awesome halter! Comes in any color pattern you choose up to age 4!

item.title: Light Comfy Romper
item.description: It’s romper season! Light, comfy, and way to take on and off for tired mama’s. Order yours today in any color you love!

item.description: It’s all about the relaxed fit romper this summer! Contact me to order your custom one today!
